title: input lag, plz help dont wanna quit league [gameplay]
body: Seems every since msi started ive been getting serious input lag while my ping is 32ms and i have over 100 fps. Its extremely frustrating playing fizz and my w or e not going off until a sec after i activate it, or i click 3 times and my champ doesn't move. Its not a hardware issue ive already checked. Anyone got any fixes? Its making the game unplayable. i have tried the hextech repair tool and it says everything is fine. funny how 1 command in 10 makes such a big difference, and how much of a idiot it makes me look like in game. been playing the game poorly for 4 years id hate to have to stop now.

replies.body:
Is all input delayed, or just some? You may be seeing network packet loss.

Cant say more without information about your system.

hextech says i have no packet loss and my internet is rated highest in the area its not all input its only like 1 in ten commands i make which lead me to believe it was packet loss i am running a older rig but the game as worked fine for over a year on this pc. also im not on wifi im hardlined
Is anyone else using your network at the time? Streaming buffering can cause huge packet loss spikes.
no more then any other time yes but it has never been a problem and it happens constantly whether someone else is on or not. maybe its net neutrality taking effect lol
NN repeal has not gone through yet, we wont be seeing any additional ISP throttling for a while, assuming the challenge on the repeal fails.

Need more info on your setup... Check screen setting (buttons on screen) make sure it's not set to be doing any extra processing... Check mouse and keyboard for latency via other programs or games.
Disable any background clip recorder (,Nvidia has one on by default as does win10)

Just spitballing here so try all that report back try to remember if you changed any settings or had any other updates on your system.

ive checked the hardware (mouse and keyboard) they are bothfunctioning fine on other games heavier then league, ive also turned my setting all the way down with no avail. i have nothing running in the background and have changed nothing about my setup since the change has occured and my drivers are up to date
